actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require producers of an agricultural commodity for which an acreage limitation program is in effect to pay certain costs as a condition of agricultural loans, purchases, and payments, and for other purposes.
short_title: Agricultural Irrigation and Deficit Reduction Act of 1995

summary.text: Agricultural Irrigation and Deficit Reduction Act of 1995 - Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require producers under an acreage limitation program to pay certain irrigation costs.

titles.title: Agricultural Irrigation and Deficit Reduction Act of 1995

A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to require producers of an agricultural commodity for which an acreage limitation program is in effect to pay certain costs as a condition of agricultural loans, purchases, and payments, and for other purposes.
